plot: A hunter from a long-time conquistador family will learn a history lesson that will remain with him for life.
title: La Larga Noche de los Quinientos Años
plot_es: A hunter from a long-time conquistador family will learn a history lesson that will remain with him for life.
original_name: La Larga Noche de los Quinientos Años
plot_en: A hunter from a long-time conquistador family will learn a history lesson that will remain with him for life.
